events.text: You bump into some squares
Out of the way! Out of the way! We are making a glorious mega square!
A lot of shapes are looking at the squares as they are putting up a grand show.
You see 9 squares forming a 3x3 big square
A crowd of shapes is cheering them on
A very sharp and tough square appears in front of you.
What are you? A triple square?
A triple what? I’m hex the hexagon…
Square1 pushes Square7 away.
Hi I am Square1, sorry for my friend here. Who might you be?
Thanks , I am Hex…
Don’t you worry, some of us squares are a bit rough around the edges. Are you enjoying your time here? The spheres throw the best parties.
Yah,, I suppose. Just walkin around.
Parties not really your thing?
There are so many unfamiliar shapes…
No need to be so apparent about it. You know what. Square9 just left, would you like to join us in our game?
Not really… Still a bit dizzy from the sphere's rolling game.
Ah come on we can’t play our game with 8 shapes.
All the squares start to move around, yelling that they are going to make a mega square again.
The entire party is looking at the 8 squares trying to make a mega square.
There is one hole in the mega square.
[i]Guess il try to fit in again...[/i]
